fields.name: account_type
fields.description: Type of the account (e.g., checking, savings)

fields.name: logo_path
fields.description: URL path to the bank's logo

fields.name: account_type
fields.description: Repetition of account type for table structure

fields.name: customer_iban
fields.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the customer

fields.name: customer_iban|slice(2,4)
fields.description: First four digits of the customer's IBAN

fields.name: customer_iban|slice(8,14)
fields.description: Next six digits of the customer's IBAN

fields.name: customer_account_number
fields.description: Account number of the customer at Citibank

fields.name: account_holder
fields.description: Name of the account holder at Citibank

fields.name: client_number
fields.description: Unique client identification number for the account holder

fields.name: date_of_birth
fields.description: Date of birth of the account holder

fields.name: customer_account_number
fields.description: Repetition of customer's account number for table structure

fields.name: customer_iban
fields.description: Repetition of the customer's IBAN for table structure

fields.name: customer_bank_name
fields.description: Name of the bank where the account is held (Citibank)

fields.name: statement_period
fields.description: Period covered by the bank statement

fields.name: statement_date
fields.description: Date the bank statement was generated

fields.name: opening_balance
fields.description: Initial balance of the account on the statement date

fields.name: transaction.date
fields.description: Date when a specific transaction occurred

fields.name: transaction.description
fields.description: Description of the specific transaction

fields.name: transaction.debit
fields.description: Amount debited for a specific transaction

fields.name: transaction.credit
fields.description: Amount credited for a specific transaction

fields.name: transaction.balance
fields.description: Balance after the specific transaction occurred

fields.name: total_debit
fields.description: Total debits recorded on the bank statement

fields.name: total_credit
fields.description: Total credits recorded on the bank statement

fields.name: total
fields.description: Overall balance at the end of the statement period
